QuestData.Title: The Wrathcaster
QuestData.Description: One of the more vile members of the Scarlet Crusade, Mataus the Wrathcaster, lurks within the barracks' dungeon. Undeath suits his dark manner.$b$bWere I younger and on the front lines, I'd run him through myself. As things are, I'm left behind to lead our forces from the rear. So I leave the pleasure to you.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you don't do it, I might go kill him myself, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: You are well on your way to becoming a true champion of the Light, $n. Well done.
